Settlement deed for Rs.2,78,000/-
28th January 2026
Signed by:- Boya Bhimalinga (Aadhaar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX) Age 47
Years Father: Boya Husenappa, Door No.1-70, Mahadeva Colony, Pamidi Town, Pamidi Mandal,
Anantapur District.
Written and given by:- Boya Kadiramma (Aadhaar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX) Age 39 years Husband Boya Bhimalinga, Door No. 1-70, Mahadeva Colony, Pamidi Town, Pamidi Mandal, Anantapur District. The settlement document that I have sworn and given is that you will be my husband. Out of my love and affection for you, with the idea of creating some stable property in your name, I have given you the property as per the schedule to which I am entitled as a gift as a reward and have made the said property your possession this very day. Therefore, from now on, you and your heirs shall enjoy the said property as per the schedule with full rights. Neither I nor my other heirs shall have any rights or obligations. I have signed the settlement document in writing and given my resignation.
Schedule:- Anantapuram R.D. The property in the field of Pamidi village, which has been acquired by my elders and is in my possession, is in the 1st ward of Pamidi Panchayat, the property in the Mahadev Colony area of Eddulapalli Road, which has been acquired by me and is in my possession, is No. Scanned with CamScanner Scanned with CamScanner Sheet Endorsement Book No: 1 CS No/Year: 302/2026 Doct No/Year: 291/2026 Presentation Endorsement Sheet 1-4 Digitally Sed by: Name S.Radharamana Location PAMIDI Reason: Endorsement Sign Date: Wed Jan 28 18:32:01 1 JOINT SUBREGISTRAR, PAMIDI Presented in the Office of the Joint Sub-Registrar, PAMIDI along with the Photographs & Thumb Impressions as required Under Section 32-A of Registration Act, 1908 and fee of Rs. 1390/- paid between the hours of 5PM and 6PM on the 28th day of
January, 2026

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 291 of 2026, dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Boya Kadiramma in favour of her husband Boya Bhimalinga, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 55.55 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 1-70A, comprised in survey number 155, Assessment No. 5608 (Old) or 257901005572 (New), 1st Ward, situated in Pamidi Village, Panchayat Mandal, within the District of Anantapur registered at sub-registrar office Pamidi is bounded as follows: North by: Donor Site South by: House of Ramanjineyulu East by: House of Nagalakshmi West by: Road
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
